name: Love Farm: Love at First Sight
name_original: Love Farm: Love at First Sight
description:
The farm is in a Hollywood crisis!

Our bunny has been binge-watching Ryan Gosling movies, and now has unrealistic expectations of love! Our bunny wants to "fall in love at first sight", just as in the movies!

Can you help save the bunny from a toxic relationship? Can you help the bunny get home without falling in love?

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Mouse - Control direction of vision cone
